name: Mario Golf: Advance Tour (Wii U)
description:
Grab your clubs, and start down the road to golfing perfection in this
role-playing adventure! Take control of a custom character, and gain
experience to improve in all aspects of golf. Chat up the locals at the
golf clinics, play singles and doubles against other competitors, and
try your best to become the champ of all the country clubs! Master the
many challenges that surround you, and you might just earn a chance to
face-off against the greats of the Mushroom Kingdom!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
